name: Fright Duty
description:
https://open.codecks.io/projectfrightduty

Premise:

You are a new spirit and have been tasked to keep pesky humans out of the dungeons and away from the spirit portals...

Use your ghostly abilities to scare them and make them leave. There may be a few casualties.

These casualties may stick around and help you give the fright to those they previously called friends.
